moves.name: razor-wind
moves.effect_entries: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.name: hyper-beam
moves.effect_entries: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: mud-slap
moves.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: steel-wing
moves.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense by one stage.

moves.name: future-sight
moves.effect_entries: Hits the target two turns later.

moves.name: secret-power
moves.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: swift
moves.effect_entries: Never misses.

moves.name: hyper-beam
moves.effect_entries: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: scorching-sands
moves.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: cut
moves.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.effect_entries: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
